title: Suit & Tie Premium Watch Face
summary: Suit & Tie watch face provides an analog experience of a classic watch
developerAddress: Bucharest, Sector 1, Str. Hatmanul Arbore nr 12
description: In an age where we can display the time on your wrist via a myriad of designs, the Suit & Tie watch face provides an analog experience for those who enjoy combining the timeless elegance of a classic watch with the latest digital technology.Premium Features:- Three different sets of markers- Three different sets of watch hands- Watch battery indicator- Date and day of the week- A second analog timer to help you keep track of the time on the other side of the world- Five different accent colours- Burn protection for AMOLED watches(because we care)P.S.: For a true classic experience, pair it with a silver metallic wristband.
descriptionHTML:
In an age where we can display the time on your wrist via a myriad of designs, the Suit & Tie watch face provides an analog experience for those who enjoy combining the timeless elegance of a classic watch with the latest digital technology.

Premium Features:
- Three different sets of markers
- Three different sets of watch hands
- Watch battery indicator
- Date and day of the week
- A second analog timer to help you keep track of the time on the other side of the world
- Five different accent colours
- Burn protection for AMOLED watches(because we care)

P.S.: For a true classic experience, pair it with a silver metallic wristband.
comments: Nice look but needs more widget options such as step count and weather. Not really a big fan of dial widgets either. Prefer number displays. Also battery status and another time zone widgets are not what I want to see displaying. More options please. Complications for Wear 2.0 would be great.
I have the same problem with the upgrade to pro. I did what you recommend for the other guys but still didn't work
Like the design so much, but need more settings (i.e for adjusting the brightness at dim/ambient mode would be great)
Looks nice but.... How bout making a weather widget as well?
Like it Please add some color option for dial background.
Simple Clean and Neat What a face.. Only lacks continuous seconds animation.. Simple and Neat
